title: Anna Nicole Smith
summary: Anna Nicole Smith (born Vickie Lynn Hogan; November 28, 1967 â€“ February 8, 2007) was an American model, actress, and television personality. Smith first gained popularity in Playboy magazine when she won the title of 1993 Playmate of the Year. She modeled for fashion companies, including Guess, H&M, Heatherette and Lane Bryant.
